1.name: On Dangerous Ground
1.description: Rough city cop Jim Wilson is disciplined by his captain and is sent upstate, to a snowy mountain town, to help the local sheriff solve a murder case.

2.name: A Streetcar Named Desire
2.description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

3.name: Strangers on a Train
3.description: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

4.name: The Thing from Another World
4.description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

5.name: Alice in Wonderland
5.description: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

6.name: A Place in the Sun
6.description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

7.name: The African Queen
7.description: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

8.name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
8.description: An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

9.name: No Highway
9.description: An aeronautical engineer predicts that a new model of plane will fail catastrophically and in a novel manner after a specific number flying hours.

10.name: Rawhide
10.description: A stagecoach stop employee and a stranded woman traveller find themselves at the mercy of four desperate outlaws intent on robbing the next day's gold shipment.

11.name: An American in Paris
11.description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

12.name: People Will Talk
12.description: Dr. Noah Praetorius falls in love with Debra, a student who finds out that she is pregnant by her old boyfriend.

13.name: Ace in the Hole
13.description: A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to re-jump start his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

14.name: The Last Outpost
14.description: Despite their fighting on opposite sides during the Civil War, brothers Vance and Jeb Britton have to set their differences aside in order to survive an Indian attack.

15.name: Quo Vadis
15.description: Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.

16.name: Fourteen Hours
16.description: An unhappy man threatens suicide by standing on the ledge of a high-rise building for 14 hours.

17.name: The Long Dark Hall
17.description: A devoted family man tries to help a beautiful alcoholic showgirl with her life, and becomes the only suspect when someone else murders her.

18.name: The House on Telegraph Hill
18.description: Concentration camp survivor Victoria Kowelska finds herself involved in mystery, greed, and murder when she assumes the identity of a dead friend in order to gain passage to America.

19.name: The Redhead and the Cowboy
19.description: Framed for murder during the Civil War, Gil Kyle's only alibi is Confederate agent Candace Bronson who he must track down in dangerous territory filled with foes.

20.name: Happy Go Lovely
20.description: B.G. Bruno, a rich bachelor, the head of a successful greeting-card company in Scotland, is essentially a kind man but respectable to the point of stodginess and extreme stuffiness. An ...                See full summary »

21.name: Cave of Outlaws
21.description: Released after serving 15 years in prison for train robbery Pete Carver being the only survivor of the gang goes looking for the loot in the caves where it was hidden.

22.name: The Tragedy of Othello: The Moor of Venice
22.description: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

23.name: When Worlds Collide
23.description: As a new star and planet hurtle toward a doomed Earth, a small group of survivalists frantically work to complete the rocket which will take them to their new home.

24.name: Anne of the Indies
24.description: In order to recover his ship impounded by the British, former pirate captain LaRochelle agrees to spy on the notorious Caribbean Sea pirates Blackbeard and Anne Providence.

25.name: Show Boat
25.description: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairytale romance is threatened when his luck turns sour.

26.name: Scrooge
26.description: An old bitter miser is given a chance for redemption when he is haunted by three ghosts on Christmas Eve...

27.name: Atoll K
27.description: Stan inherits a yacht and a South Pacific island. Ollie and Stan sail there with 2 other men. They shipwreck on a new atoll and settle there. An ex-fiancee joins them. They declare an independent nation and problems arise.

28.name: The Man in the White Suit
28.description: An altruistic chemist invents a fabric which resists wear and stain as a boon to humanity, but big business and labor realize it must be suppressed for economic reasons.

29.name: The Lavender Hill Mob
29.description: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

30.name: Royal Wedding
30.description: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when booked in London during the Royal Wedding.

31.name: The Red Badge of Courage
31.description: Truncated adaptation of Stephen Crane's novel about a Civil War Union soldier who stuggles to find the courage to fight in the heat of battle.

32.name: His Kind of Woman
32.description: A deported gangster's plan to re-enter the USA involves skulduggery at a Mexican resort, and gambler Dan Milner is caught in the middle.

33.name: Westward the Women
33.description: A trail guide escorts a group of women from Chicago to California to marry men that have recently began settling there.

34.name: On Moonlight Bay
34.description: During World War I, a teenage girl begins a romance with a college student, but his unconventional attitudes cause friction with her father.

35.name: There Is Another Sun
35.description: The story about a prizefighter and a motorcycle daredevil that vie for the beautiful girl from the Carnival.

36.name: Detective Story
36.description: On one day in the 21st Precinct squad room, assorted characters form a backdrop for the troubles of hard-nosed Detective Jim McLeod.

37.name: Laughter in Paradise
37.description: When a millionaire practical joker dies, he divides his fortune among four heirs who must carry out his zany instructions to cash in.

38.name: Decision Before Dawn
38.description: As the US Army approaches Nazi Germany, they recruit German prisoners to spy behind German lines.

39.name: Captain Horatio Hornblower R.N.
39.description: During the Napoleonic wars, a British Navy Captain has adventures in Central American waters.

40.name: The Prowler
40.description: When Susan Gilvray reports a prowler outside her house police officer Webb Garwood investigates and sparks fly. If only her husband wasn't in the way.

41.name: Olivia
41.description: Olivia, an English teenager, arrives at a finishing school in France. The majority of the pupils in the school are divided into two camps: those that are devoted to the headmistress, Mlle ...                See full summary »

42.name: Flying Leathernecks
42.description: Major Kirby leads The Wildcats squadron into the historic WWII battle of Guadalcanal.

43.name: The Man with a Cloak
43.description: In 1848 NYC, a Frenchwoman visits exiled former French Marshal Thevenet to ask for his financial help in behalf of his French grandson but Thevenet's house staff schemes to kill him and take his fortune.

44.name: Operation Pacific
44.description: During WWII, a submarine's second in command inherits the problem of torpedoes that don't explode. When on shore, he is eager to win back his ex-wife.

45.name: The River
45.description: Three adolescent girls growing up in Bengal, India, learn their lessons in life after falling for an older American soldier.

46.name: Another Man's Poison
46.description: In an isolated house, mystery writer Janet Frobisher is involved in potentially murderous relationships.

47.name: M
47.description: In this Americanization of the 1931 German thriller, both the police and the criminal underworld stalk a mysterious killer who preys on small children.

48.name: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
48.description: A seductive woman falls in love with a mysterious ship's captain.

49.name: David and Bathsheba
49.description: After King David sees the beautiful Bathsheba bathing from the palace roof, he enters into an adulterous affair which has tragic consequences for his family and Israel.

50.name: Miracolo a Milano
50.description: An open hearted and unrelentingly energetic orphan struggles to make the best out of his life on the streets of Milan.
